content: this amigurumi pattern includes instructions inspired by my little pony s pinkie pie rarity applejack and rainbow dash you can also mix it up with your own fun color combinations the finished size is 6 inches 15 cm tall when made with dk/sport yarn and a 3 mm or 3 25 mm hook you can make larger ponies about 7 or 8 inches tall with worsted yarn and a 3 5 mm hook you ll need two 6mm black plastic eyes for each pony stuffing yarn hook scissors pins yarn needle and a stitch marker plastic eyes not recommended for children under 3 the parts are made in continuous spiral rounds you will need to know how to read a crochet pattern and how to make a chain slip_stitch single_crochet half-double_crochet double_crochet triple crochet increases decreases and work in back loops or front loops you will also need to know how to use a needle and yarn to sew crocheted parts together and weave in or hide ends a special thank you to terriko 1 for sharing her free pony pattern in her blog her ideas helped me develop this version 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-pony-pattern-inspired-by-my-little-pony
